Book Description


By 2045, the autonomous country of Alataria is a place plagued with crime, corruption and greed. Everyone wants something. Those smart enough get to have it. The rest either die or live a miserable life. In this grim reality, gangs and crime organizations rose to power and now rule the different districts of the country while men of the law sit around and barely do anything about it. Six individuals go on separate quests in this harsh land. Each one has a different goal or agenda. Each one has different wishes and desires.
